title: Taliban threaten second Afghan provincial capital as insurgency spreads
text:
Taliban threaten second Afghan provincial capital as insurgency spreads 
Published By: Reuters - Today 
KABUL (Reuters) - Fighting intensified around the Afghan city of Ghazni on Monday, as Taliban militants threatened to seize a second provinc...
